title: Michigan moves nomination further away from Bernie Sanders's reach on Big Tuesday
description: After another round of primary losses for Bernie Sanders, Carrie Dann is joined by Yamiche Alcindor and Alex Seitz-Wald to talk about the next steps for his campaign and what Joe Biden has to do in order to cinch the nomination.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
